org.svvrl.goal.cmd
Class CommandRepository

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.cmd.CommandRepository

public class CommandRepository
extends java.lang.Object

CommandRepository provides methods for accessing the command pool.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

getCommand

public static CommandExpression getCommand(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.util.List<Expression> args)
Returns the command expression with a specified command name and command arguments.

Parameters:
name - the name of the command
args - the arguments of the command
Returns:
the command expression constructed from the command name name and the command arguments args
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is no command with name name or the arguments args are not well-formed for the command

getDefaultComplementCommandExtension

public static CommandExtension getDefaultComplementCommandExtension(AutomatonType type)
Returns the default extension of the complementation command for a specified automaton type.

Parameters:
type - an automaton type
Returns:
the default extension of the complementation command for the automaton type type, or null if there is no default complementation construction for the automaton type

getDefaultComplementCommandExtensions

public static java.util.Map<AutomatonType,CommandExtension> getDefaultComplementCommandExtensions()
Returns a map from an automaton type to its default complementation construction.

Returns:
a map from an automaton type to its default complementation construction

getComplementCommand

public static CommandExpression getComplementCommand(java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.util.List<Expression> args)
Returns the complementation command with a specified name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the complementation command
args - the arguments for the complementation command
Returns:
a complementation command with name name, or null if there is no complementation command with such name
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error during parsing the arguments

addGameSolver

                                 GameSolverInterface solver)
Inserts a command-line interface of a game solver to this repository.

Parameters:
name - the name of the game solver
solver - the command-line interface of the game solver

getGameSolver

public static GameSolverInterface getGameSolver(java.lang.String name)
Returns the command-line interface of a game solver by its name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the returned solver
Returns:
the command-line interface of the game solver of the specified name, or null if there is no solver of such name

getGameSolverNames

public static java.lang.String[] getGameSolverNames()
Returns the names of available game solver interfaces.

Returns:
the names of available game solver interfaces
